content: Wow. I need to just let you know something….. I’m having probably one of the WORST fraking days in recent memory….(long story; irrelevant for the point I want to make)…. Anyway… you weren’t kidding about that Star Trek episode!! I just watched it. It was simply phenomenal. And I’m not really a big fan… The point is, you improved my fraking day. I’m a bartender. In the Florida Keys. I am going to try your fraking suggestions today. Let’s see what the frak happens…. Lol❤️💙💚💛💜
